summary: Consume Bannerbear API to create and manipulate images or templates.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose between working with an image or a template.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Specify the operation to perform on the selected resource.

parameters.name: template id
parameters.description: The template ID you want to use for creating an image.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional settings for creating an image like metadata, webhook URL, etc.

parameters.name: modifications
parameters.description: Specify modifications to apply to the image like text, color, background, etc.

parameters.name: image id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the image when performing 'Get' operation.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Specify the operation to perform on templates.

parameters.name: template id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the template when performing 'Get' operation.
